content.title: Intro
content.content: -ntë is a pronominal Quenya ending, inflexion of 3 plural ("they") when no subject is previously mentioned. (Seen in Círion's Oath.)[1]

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, Christopher Tolkien (ed.), Unfinished Tales, "Cirion and Eorl and the Friendship of Gondor and Rohan", note 43
